Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 78th overall pick, by Gashouse in 1979...
Injured on 4/2/1980 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 6/7/1980 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1983, off James Carino (CC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/1983, off Augustine Lucero (DIA)...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/13/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $1,500,000 per year...
